title.narrative: 6.5 COMMUNICATION

description.narrative: The Communication function effectively supports the advocacy, external/donor relations, fundraising and partnership efforts of the Country Office with a high level of quality assurance and technical expertise, also contributing to One-UN Communication., which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Effective & efficient programme management and operations support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The Communication function effectively supports the advocacy, external/donor relations, fundraising and partnership efforts of theCountry Office with a high level of quality assurance and technical expertise, also contributing to One-UN Communication.

description.narrative: The communication function has effectively supported the advocacy, external/donor relations, fundraising and partnership efforts of the Country Office with a high level of quality assurance and technical expertise, and has also contributed to One UN communication. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: Advocacy/Support to programmes function - Number of news reports about children's issues published and broadcast through Viet Nam newspaper, radio and TV. Availability of a digital media plan for 2012-2013. Timely and relevant services are provided to programmes and programmes maximise use of Communication services

baseline.value: 150 articles, and 2 Op-Eds by the Representative released in Vietnamese and international news outlets in 2011. 8 human interest stories, 2 video stories and 2 photos essays produced in 2011 and poste

target.value: :170 articles, and 4 Op-Eds by the Representative released in Vietnamese and international news outlets on an annual basis. 10 human interest stories, 3 video stories and 3 photos essays produced on an

title.narrative: Fundraising support/Goodwill Ambassador relations function - The CO has more clarity as to what are the best strategies to engage with National Committees and additional funding in support of country programme activities is secured. Availability of a work plan for 2012-2013 to engage UNICEF Viet Nam's Goodwill Ambassadors

target.value: :Availability of an “Investments versus returns from NatCom engagement” analysis. At least five NatComs/donor visits hosted annually. An additional Goodwill Ambassador appointed in 2012 and four events

title.narrative: Innovation & Partnerships - Evidence on the issue of digital safety is generated and shared with government stakeholders, partnerships developed with media/Internet companies

baseline.value: MoU signed with Yahoo! on digital safety in 2011

target.value: :One exploratory research conducted, consultative workshop with multiple stakeholders in 2012 and media briefing organised in 2013. National awareness raising activities on digital safety conducted on

title.narrative: Children and young people's participation function - A number of platforms are created to allow young people to share their views on issues that affect their lives

target.value: :One child-led video workshop on climate change organised and a photo contest launched on digital media in 2012. One child-led photo workshop on climate change organised in 2013.
